content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at (x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (x=1.0, y=1.0) and (x=3.0, y=1.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (x=1.5, y=2.5) and (x=3.5, y=2.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (x=1.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5) storing iron plates

### Additional Storage at (x=5.5, y=2.5-3.5)
Consists of:
- One wooden chest at position (x=5.5, y=3.5)
- One burner inserter at position (x=5.5, y=2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line at (x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (x=2.0, y=7.0) and (x=4.0, y=7.0)
- Two burner inserters at positions (x=2.5, y=8.5) and (x=4.5, y=8.5)
- Two wooden chests at positions (x=2.5, y=9.5) and (x=4.5, y=9.5) storing copper plates

### Power Generation System at (x=-5.5 to 13.5, y=26.5-35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (x=2.5, y=35.5)
- Boiler at position (x=7.0, y=35.5)
- Steam engine at position (x=13.5, y=35.5)
- Pipe network connecting components:
  - Water pipes from pump to boiler (fluid system 1517)
  - Steam pipes from boiler to engine (fluid system 1520)
- Electric pole network connecting various parts of the factory

### Disconnected Pump
- Unused offshore pump at position (x=-5.5, y=26.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Boiler is out of fuel and needs coal to operate efficiently
- Ensure regular fuel supply to maintain continuous power generation

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warning
- Maintain consistent supply of raw materials to furnaces to prevent idle time

### Fluid System Management
- Disconnected offshore pump at (x=-5.5, y=26.5) shows "No fluid present in connections" warning
- Either connect the pump to a fluid system or remove it if not needed

### Resource Management
- Ensure all burner inserters have sufficient fuel to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor fuel levels in all burner-powered entities regularly
